features.name: features
features.title: Unlock Unlimited Possibilities with Pictoria AI
features.text: Our platform offers a wide range of features designed to enhance your image creation experience. From easy-to-use editing tools to powerful AI-powered image generation, we have everything you need to bring your ideas to life.

hero.title2: Transform your photos with the power of AI
hero.title3: From LinkedIn headshots to Instagram influencer photos, Pictoria AI's state-of-the-art technology ensures you always look your best. Create, edit, and generate images effortlessly.

price.title1: Choose the plan that fits your needs
price.title2: Choose an offordable plan that is packed with the best features for engaging your audience,createing customer loyalty and driving sales. engaging your

review.title3: Discover why thousands are choosing Pictoria AI for effortless,high-quality photo generation, from LinkedIn headshots to vibrant social media content.

ready.title2: Join thousands of users who are already creating amazing AI-generated images.

changePassword.name: Change Password
changePassword.desc: Enter your new password below to change/update your password.
changePassword.passwordDesc: Enter a strong password that meets the requirements above.
changePassword.confirmPasswordDesc: Re-enter your new password to confirm.
changePassword.info: Make sure to remember your new password or store it securely.
changePassword.passwordMessage: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
changePassword.passwordRegex: Password must contain 8 characters,1 uppercase letter,1 lowercase letter,1 number and 1 special character.
